body:
Fix the perl test case bug https://github.com/Perl/perl5/issues/15544:

Variable `PATH` longer than 1000 characters (as is usual with spack) fails a perl test case:

The fix is: Don't test PATH in testcase `perlbug.t`

Fixes `spack install --test=all` for specs triggering a build and test of perl! :100: %
title: perl: Fix test case bug Perl/perl5#15544: Don't fail with PATH >1000 chars
